overview: Old McDonald Had a Train, Snoopy on a handcar, real N&W J, fire scene from Choo Choo barn, real steamers from Hesston Steam Museum, cow jokes, action at a miniature circus, the operating Milk car. I've Been Workin' on the Railroad, Wabash Cannonball, Twinkle Twinkle. Standard Gauge trains operating on massive Carail layout, parade. Stars and Stripes Forever, a rocket to the moon, fireworks. Prewar classics like the Blue Comet, circus action, how farmers grow food, Santa Fe Super Chief, the real Norfolk & Western J and Southern Pacific Daylight. Beethoven s 5th. Blue Angels Air Show, I've Been Workin' on the Railroad. Loading coal and culverts, fire scene, transfer table, bascule bridge and magnetic crane in action. Classics like the Lionel Blue Comet, State Set and the Ives Black Diamond in action. Fireworks. I've Been Workin on the Railroad, how track is installed, American Flyer accessories, erector coal dumping accessory, logs and coal loaded and unloaded, kitty on the tracks!
title: I Love Toy Trains: Parts 1-3
